experience.description: Built Angular web applications for open banking payments, user profiles, and customer dashboards, emphasizing accessibility, UX, and testability; also worked on a Flutter mobile app for iOS and Android. Contributed to some backend Java maintenance.
Managed parts inventory and distribution, supported technicians and customers, and handled requests through internal service applications.
Developed web applications and connected them to REST APIs using Angular 2+; improved user experience and ensured the code was clean and maintainable.
Static websites mostly for small local businesses development with HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
Air freight transportation from all over the world to Lithuania.
Coordination of freight trucks movement through Europe.
